title: George Will, "American Happiness and Discontents: The Unruly Torrent, 2008-2020"
description:
Syndicated columnist George Will reflects on what he calls the 'unruly torrent years' between 2008-2020. He's interviewed by Amanda Carpenter, Bulwark columnist, and CNN political contributor.
